name: Fun With Mandarin Preschool
description: Childcare and education for children 18 months - preK. Two locations that offer a large variety of deeply-enriching and complete indoor and outdoor experiences to support the comprehensive and linguistic development of children.
fullDescription: Childcare and education for children 18 months - preK. Two locations that offer a large variety of deeply-enriching and complete indoor and outdoor experiences to support the comprehensive and linguistic development of children.
whatTheyOffer: Childcare and education for children 18 months - preK. Two locations that offer a large variety of deeply-enriching and complete indoor and outdoor experiences to support the comprehensive and linguistic development of children.
howToGetIt: Follow the steps on their website to submit an application and make an appointment for a tour.
agency: Fun With Mandarin Preschool and Daycare
